ProductInfo.Features:
Windows 7 Professional 64-Bit; AMD Elite A6-5350M 2.9GHz up to 3.5GHz Turbo Core Accelerated Processor
15.6" diagonal LED-backlit HD anti-glare display (1366 x 768); 8GB DDR3L 1600MHz PC3-12800 RAM (2 Dimm)
128GB Solid State (SSD) Performance Hard Drive; AMD Radeon HD 8450G Graphics (up to 2158MB total memory)
802.11b/g/n; Gigabit Ethernet; Webcam; 2 x USB 3.0; 2 x USB 2.0; 6-Cell 47Wh Li-Ion Battery (Up to 6.2 hours)
Spill-Resistant Keyboard with Numeric Keypad; DVD+/-RW; DTS+ Sound; HDMI; VGA; 1 Year HP Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: HP ProBook 455 G1 AMD Elite 15.6-Inch Windows 7 Professional Business Notebook PC (A6-5350M 2.9GHz, 128GB Performance SSD Hard Drive, Windows 7 PRO, Radeon 8450G, 8GB RAM)
